title: Microsoft Band 2 pre-orders go live on Amazon for shipment on October 30
text:
Microsoft Band 2 pre-orders go live on Amazon for shipment on October 30 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
The Microsoft Band 2 is now available from another US retailer. Pre-orders for the wearable have now gone live on Amazon for the price of $2...
